hedline.hl1: Conde Nast Bundles Magazines in Ad Sale

abstract.p: Conde Nast Publications, a unit of Advance Publications, will include Details, Jane and W, consumer magazines of sibling Fairchild Publications, in its 'super buy' package, which enables advertisers to buy large numbers of ad pages in 17 Conde Nast magazines at more attractive prices (S)

block.p: The corporate sales division of Conde Nast Publications in New York, part of Advance Publications, will include the three consumer magazines of a sibling, Fairchild Publications, in its ''super buy'' package, which enables advertisers to buy large numbers of ad pages in the 17 Conde Nast magazines at more attractive prices. The Fairchild magazines to be included, effective on Jan. 1, are Details, Jane and W. Other operations of Conde Nast and Fairchild will remain separate.
